# Folder path on USB drive

```{r}
USBFolderPath <- "D:/TargetFolder"
```

# Check if folder exists

```{r}
if (dir.exists(USBFolderPath)) {cat("Folder found on USB drive:", USBFolderPath, "\n")} else {cat("Folder not found.\n")}
```

# Remove old values

```{r}
rm ("ExternalDrive", "ExternalDriveFiles", "folder_path")
```

# Current path

```{r}
getwd()
```

# Copy folders and files from USB

```{r}
DestinationPath <- "c:/Users/lynnm/Documents/Week2"
```

# Check if source exists

```{r}
if (!dir.exists(USBFolderPath)) {stop("Source folder does not exist. Check USB path.")}
```

# Create destination folder if it doesn't exist

```{r}
if (!dir.exists(DestinationPath)) {dir.create(DestinationPath, recursive = TRUE)}
```

# Copy folder recursively

```{r}
success <- file.copy(from = USBFolderPath, to = DestinationPath, recursive = TRUE, copy.mode = TRUE, copy.date = TRUE)
```

```{r}
if (success) {message("Copy completed successfully")} else {warning("Some files could not be copied.")}
```
